column3: black trees]] that not even [[Legolas]] could long endure they found a hollow place opening at the mountain's root, and right in their path stood a single mighty stone like a finger of doom. 'My blood runs chill,' said [[Gimli]]

column1: The '''glen''' at the '''[[Dwimorberg]]''' was a location on the side of the mountain. At one end was the forest of [[Dimholt]]; on the other, the [[Dark Door]].
